basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Samus Aran.  I am a former member of the Federation Police.  Having served with distinction I ended my service to become a bounty hunter.  I am the one you send in when everyone else has failed, or when failure cannot be an option.

projects.title: Defeat Of Space Pirates on Planet Zebes
projects.description: As a last resort, the Federation decides to me to penetrate the Pirates' base and destroy Mother Brain, the biomechanical life-form that controls the Space Pirates' fortress and its defenses. I was chosen for the mission.  Landing on the surface of Zebes and exploring the planet, I traveled through the planet's caverns. I came across Kraid, an ally of the Space Pirates, and Ridley, the Space Pirates' commander, and defeated them both. I did find and destroy Mother Brain.

projects.title: Eradication of Dangerous Metroids on SR388
projects.description: Commisioned by the galactic federation, I was dispatched to SR388 to eradicate the growing Metroid Menace.  Destroying the queen and all other metroids save one small baby Metroid.

projects.title: Defeat of the Metroid Prime
projects.description: After crashing into Talon IV, I learned that a heavily mutated Metroid from a Phazon meteor is poised to cause heavy destruction, like always I defeated it.
